resources.string: An error occurred while connecting to the server.

Amrita Repository is an unofficial app. The institution (Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham) has no link whatsoever with this application (or) it's working/maintenance. 

All educational information and content contained in this app are provided solely for general information and reference purposes. This app is provided on an "as is" basis. Amrita Repository makes no statement, representation, warranty or guarantee as to the accuracy, reliability or timeliness of the information and content contained in this application, which has been scraped from *.amrita.edu 

If you find any question paper unavailable (or) inaccuracy with the data provided in this application, you may contact the department in-charge and not Amrita Repository. 

Rajkumar,
Developer of Amrita Repository
Site\'s structure has changed. Please wait until I catch up.

This will be a donation for the effort of developing Amrita Repository which brings resources from different websites under a single roof right at your fingertips. To develop a software like this takes technical knowledge, time, and effort. I would be very glad if you can appreciate my work with your kind donations. All the content brought to you in this app belongs to Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham and I don't own any of these.

Thank you in advance,
Rajkumar

1) Turn on WiFi Hotspot on your computer (or) any other device, to which you want to share files of Amrita Repository. 

2) Connect your mobile device to that WiFi hotspot. 

3) Press the Start Server button below. 

4) An URL will be displayed below the button. Open up a browser on your computer and enter this URL and hola! You're good to go.
If you are a faculty and would like to add your site on behalf of your department in this application, please drop a mail to rajkumaar2304@icloud.com
If you ♥ the app, consider donating here
